mapper.update: update reply set replytext=#{replytext}, updatedate=sysdate where rno = #{rno}
mapper.select: select * from reply where BNO = #{BNO} order by rno desc
mapper.insert: insert into reply (rno, bno, replytext, replyer) values ((select NVL2(max(rno), max(rno)+1, 1) from reply), #{bno}, #{replytext}, #{replyer})
